meta_title: Orfina Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177 – Swiss Shield Dial Variant
meta_description: Explore the Swiss Shield dial variant of the Orfina Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177, featuring distinctive Swiss Shield logos, matte black finish, red 3H tritium markers, and robust Lemania 5100 movement. A unique military chronograph reflecting Porsche Design’s precision and style.
meta_keywords: Orfina Porsche Design 7177 Swiss Shield dial, Military Chronograph dial variants, Swiss Shield logo watch dial, Lemania 5100 chronograph, Orfina military watches, Porsche Design black dial, 1980s military chronograph dial, tritium dial markings

list.title: Issued:
list.text:
The Swiss Military variant was supposedly issued to Switzerland's
military.

list.title: Swiss Coat of Arms Dial:
list.text:
Bears a “Swiss Coat of Arms” as well as an
additional line of text “by ORFINA”
.

list.title: Finish:
list.text: Produced only in Olive Green PVD.
